SUB_W17_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
I smell a battlefield.
No question about it.

SUB_W17_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W17_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
I don't like this place at all.
Maybe we picked the wrong door.

SUB_W17_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Gotta be a coincidence. I mean,
the battlefield ain't chasin' us—
we're the ones chasing IT! Anyway, let's get this done
and find our triangle.

SUB_W17_SCAN_BOFO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_SCAN_BOFO_INITIAL_WAVE_000_CUT_0.text:
Hoo-ee! Look at them fancy digs!
Probably got a king or queen
livin' high on the hog in there.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Be welcome in Brighthome, my new warriors!
I am Din, the king of this land, and full glad
am I that you have answered my call.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text: You sayin' you called us here?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Just so. I have summoned you hence so you
might join the battle against the forces
of Chaos spreading o'er this land.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
We are set against them in battle without end,
and require aid from warriors across the
Conjoined Worlds that we might continue
our brave endeavor.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Don't sound like this war of yours
is goin' so good, feller.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Our brave allies continue their valorous fight
across the land—and while we have seen many
victories, so too have we known much of defeat.
Alas, Chaos is not a foe easily laid low.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
I would have you two join us as we attempt to
drive our foes back unto the Cleft of Chaos,
located far to the north of this castle.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
We're glad to help if you got a problem,
but this don't seem like the kinda situation
that's gonna change just by throwin' a couple
more bodies at it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
It seems you do not truly comprehend
your strength as a warrior.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
The nearby village and fields were set upon
by the forces of Chaos, and the battle to
see them safe is now underway. And while I know it unseemly to ask this so
soon after your arrival in our world, I would
have you lend us your sword arms, that we might
drive our hated foe into the sea.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
Gotcha. But first, we got a question:
You seen a strange triangle around here?
One that'd fit into this frame?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
Relics from the Conjoined Worlds can sometimes
slip into Brighthome, and triangles like the one
you describe are among their number. That said, it's possible your relic has
already fallen into the hands of Chaos.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
No sir, I don't like the sound of that.
Guess this means there ain't no choice
but to take up the fight against Chaos.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
Then I hereby decree you to be our
newest warrior, and grant you both
the proud appellation of Seer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
All who find their way to Brighthome
are granted a name by the king, Seer.
This is the way of things.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_TUT_000_CUT_010.text:
Well, shoot! That's a name that makes a gal
feel mighty tough—even if I am lookin' for
triangles and not a new handle.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh, you must be King Din's newest warriors.
I'm President, and I lead the warrior band in
charge of this village and the surrounding area.
It's good to meet you both.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
That castle ain't even a hop away!
Has the enemy really penetrated
this far into your territory?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
This war is unfolding across all Brighthome—
and when things are going poorly for us on the
other side of the bridges, the forces of Chaos are
able to harry us as they like on this side.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
That said, they're nowhere near as strong here
as they are at the positions closest to the
Cleft of Chaos, which is why a man like me
can still be of some use. My field is governance, you see.
Not war.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text: So King Din called you here too.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
Indeed. From what I understand, the people
of this world can't hold their own in the war
against the forces of Chaos, so they call on
the power of fighters from other worlds.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text: Uh-huh. And how's the war goin'?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
Like I said, it's raging across Brighthome,
which makes it difficult to get an accurate
picture of the entire situation. That's likely
why King Din is expecting so much from you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
Well, we'll do our best, but we still
ain't got a firm grasp on the entire
situation here.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
You all have the power to see unobstructed.
To see much. To forecast. To watch. 
That's why you were given your names.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
Nobody can ever know what's gonna
happen on the battlefield—forecastin'
it is a dang fool's errand.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
While you'll often find yourself facing
many choices, you can only ever aid
one particular area at a time. And while the war will get worse in locations
where you don't help, you can't do anything
about that. You're just two people, after all,
so try to keep that in mind.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_000_CUT_00.text:
Big responsibility, ain't it? Well, I reckon
we should go see how things are at the fields,
seein' as we went and decided to come here first.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text:
You must be our new warriors—and I see King Din
has given you both the name of Seer. I'm President,
and I lead the fighters in charge of this village and
the surrounding area. Thanks for the help.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text: Honestly, I was a little disappointed you went to the fields—but it wasn't wrong, per se. When it comes to where you go, all you can do is make whatever choice you think is best.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text:
But as you get deeper into the war and head over
the bridges, you need to have a plan in place—
because any locations on this side that you leave
on their own will be targeted by the enemy. And look, I know our ultimate goal is to
strike at the Cleft of Chaos, but if all
we think about is advancing the line...

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text:
Then all our positions on this side'a
the bridges will be in deep dung.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text:
Yep. Slow and steady progress is the best
course—or at least that's what I think.
Everyone else seems to just want big
flashy results, though, so who knows.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_TUT_010_CUT_00.text:
Now, c'mon. Let's work together
and liberate Brighthome from the
clutches of Chaos.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, you must be King Din's new warriors!
I'm Manikin—I lead the warrior band that
protects these fields.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
The war's unfolding all across Brighthome, and
when things are going bad on the other side of
the bridges, the forces of Chaos show up here.
Hell, sometimes they even come to these fields!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
That said, the enemy's pretty weak here
compared to their strength near the
Cleft of Chaos, which is how a fellow
like me can still be useful. So if you need someone to watch over
a field, I'm your guy.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text: So King Din called you here, too.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Sure did! No idea why the king needed a wooden
thing like me to help out, but here I am—and
I want to do the best job I can to aid the people
and fields of this world.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text: Uh-huh. And how's the war goin'?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Buddy, I'm basically a glorified scarecrow—
things like strategy and warfare and all that
are beyond my pay grade. I'm guessing that's
why King Din is expecting so much from you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Not quite sure what he's expectin',
seein' as we just got here and don't
know squat about this place.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Yeah, but he named you both Seer, right?
That means you've got the power to see
things unobstructed—to predict the future,
watch what unfolds, and understand it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
But no matter how much you can see, you can still
only help one place at a time—so the others will
just have to figure out some other way to get by. I know that sounds rough, but trust me,
you'll get used to it. Just remember that
you're not fighting alone, so get out
there and do the best you can, okay?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_000_CUT_000_.text:
Big responsibility, ain't it? Well, I reckon
we should go see how things are in the village,
seein' as we went and decided to come here first.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Well, you must be King Din's new warriors!
I'm Manikin—I lead the warrior band that
protects these fields.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Yeah, it wasn't great watching you head
to the village before us, but I figured
you'd make it out this way eventually.
And now look! Here you are.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Just remember that the closer you get to
the Cleft of Chaos in the hinterlands,
the harder it will be for you to come
back here and help out. Basically, while you're off helping at one
location, positions elsewhere might fall to
the forces of Chaos. It's a huge bummer,
but them's the breaks.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text:
I'm really not a big-picture kind of gal.
More a 'kick the everlovin' snot outta 
the enemy in front of me' kind.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Well, as for me, my job is to keep
an eye on things—and thankfully,
I am GREAT at standing completely
motionless and staring at stuff!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_TUT_010_CUT_000_.text:
Now get out there and let's give this
fight all we've got—for Brighthome's
people AND its fields!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
So you're the newcomer, eh, Seer? Tongues around
here are all a'wag about how you two are the
greatest thing since milled bread, which is why
the king is expecting great things from you. Me though? I don't trust that kind of talk—
and folks like you who encourage it really
chap my cheeks. So I think it's time to knock
you around and show you what's what.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Hon, you need to learn to prioritize!
Gonna have to put you in your place
right quick so we can get back to it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Heh. You ain't half bad, Seer.
The name's Bully—or at least that's
what people around here call me.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Yeah, that's what I thought:
all talk, no fists. Well, I'm Bully—leader of the warrior band
in these parts. Pretty short name, but you
seem a bit dense, so write it down somewhere
if it helps you remember.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
This ain't just any old mine,
I take it?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I only just got here myself, so I don't
know a whole lot more than you.
Basically, stuff that's dug up here gets
sent to King Din's castle.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
So everything here is headed to
King Din back at the castle?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text: Let's use it to help nearby areas.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Heh. I like the way you think, Seer—
sending all this junk off to the king
always struck me as a hell of a waste.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Wonder if he'll cotton to us
takin' his stuff like this.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_1.text:
We couldn't fight the forces of Chaos if we
were afraid of what the damn king might do!
Look, I'll just sock him one if he complains,
so don't worry that pretty face about it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_TUT_000_CUT_000_1.text:
So the king's boots ain't been tonguewashed
enough for your liking, eh? Sure thing, Seer.
I hear ya loud and clear.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text:
You must be the new war assets I keep hearing
about. I take it you're traveling the world
like some commando unit? Ah, but that
makes me jealous... Anyway, I'm Warden, and it's my job
to watch over the graveyard.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text:
When the dead are pulling themselves out of the
dirt and roaming the land? You better believe it.
Hell, that's the dictionary definition of Chaos,
ain't it, pal? That's why the enemy's always got
their beady little eyes fixed on
the corpses here.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text:
On top of that, we've got bodies piling up like
cordwood, and not enough hands to see 'em
properly buried. We're pretty much cleaning
up after the other warrior bands' messes.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text:
Also, King Din might've named me Warden,
but I don't see why I've gotta resign myself
to watching over some moldering old graves. I should be out there saving grand castles,
sacred temples, and ancient ruins. I mean,
hell, any idiot can keep an eye on a grave,
but I was meant for greater things!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVEYARD_TUT_000_CUT_.text: Another who doesn't appreciate my value!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Hey! You there! I KNOW you're not here
to steal my prey, right? Riiiiiight!? Hmm... Now that I look more closely,
I don't think I've seen your faces before.
Which warrior band are you with?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Oh, we're with the Capitol City
Police Departme— Er, we're Seer.
Both of us, apparently.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Ah, right. The new 'reinforcements.'
I heard warriors with the power to
turn the tide of the war were coming—
though can't say I'm seeing it in you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Whole lot'a weight gettin' thrown on
our shoulders around here—but if we're
in this fight, we're in it to win it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Well, so long as I get to keep fighting my heart
out, I don't really care what you do or how the
war effort's going overall. I chew up fiends and
spit 'em out, and that's what makes sense to me.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Hey, good for you, darlin'.
Everyone's got their reason to fight.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
I'm just a fighter invited here by King Din.
If you wanna know all the whys and hows,
you'll have to ask the big man himself.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Now, are you gonna stand here talking
to me all day, or are you gonna get out
there and scope some more positions?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
This is awful. I guess Chaos invaded
and made a mess of this here town.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
But some people yet live here,
and we fight to protect them. I am Floral. You are Seer,
the ones people are talking about, yes?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text: Rumors abound, eh? Hope they're all good.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Good and bad in equal measure—the good
being that you might be the ones who can
bring an end to this wretched war.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I will not speak of it, for I place no
stock in rumor. Rather, I would like to
ascertain the truth of you for myself.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Hey, I'm with you there—seein' is believin',
as I always say. Rumors are usually just
pretty lies anyway.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Then test your mettle against the forces
of Chaos here in town so I might determine
the truth of you. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I am Gunner. You are Seer, yes?
We have succeeded in retaking
the stronghold, and I thank you
for your assistance.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Finally managed to get all the way here,
right on the Cleft of Chaos's doorstep.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Indeed. This fortress was built to deal with
the mighty fiends that emerge from the Cleft,
but it had fallen into enemy hands long ago.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
So what's the situation?
We advancin' on the Cleft?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
No, the time is not yet right. We will better
our chances at successfully cutting off the
Cleft if we take all the positions around it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text: Sound thinkin'. We'll go check 'em out.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Looks like we got a temple here. Bit surprisin'
there's no fiends, given that we're right in
the maw of the beast. Still, don't seem we
need to worry about protectin' this place.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text: You do not! For I, Sorceress, am here!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
I was surprised to see more newcomers,
but then realized you two must be Seer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
Ah, but what fine timing! The forces of Chaos
have come, drawn as they are to your power.
Now you can show me just what King Din's
secret weapons are made of!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLE_TUT_000_CUT_000.text:
You clearly know how to fight, Seer. Perhaps
you truly are the ones who will bring an end
to the war with Chaos—not that such a thing
is any fun where I'm concerned.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Welcome to Hell, Seer. Have you found
the triangle you are looking for?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Sure ain't. So is this place
in ruins because of Chaos?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
This place was a ruin well before the
Cleft of Chaos even opened. This is
why it attracts the forces of Chaos,
and why it has become Hell itself.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Ha! Guess that makes you the
watchman of Hell, don't it?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
You would name me the watchman of Hell?
You are a funny thing.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
You're different from the other warriors.
Did King Din summon you here?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I am Gadget. I came here with my own name,
but that's the one I use now that I'm working
for the king.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Pleasure. Anyway, give us a shout if you come
across our triangle—we think someone on
Chaos's side may have it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
There is one thing alone that I can do:
send those beasts that come flooding from
the Cleft of Chaos to Hell. Kyaaa ha ha!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_TUT_000_CUT_000_0.text:
And with that, it appears we've enemies
closing in. I'll be certain to share a couple
of them with you!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Temple and the ruins both got their share'a
weirdoes working 'em. Things like humanity
start losing all definition when you're stuck
in the hell of war for too long.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Those warriors are interested in nothing save
demonstrating their own strength—they could not
care less about the war or cooperating with our
other positions across the land. That said, they are also the only reason
you and I are able to continue fighting
so close to the Cleft.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.text:
I reckoned as much, which is why I went
to talk to 'em. That said, I think now's
our chance to attack all at once.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_TUT_010_CUT_000_0.text:
I wager this is true—and hope so
as well. For now is our chance
to march on the Cleft of Chaos!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
So you have arrived at last.
Well done, Seer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
King Din! Sorry, but we ain't
quite claimed the ruins yet.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Be that as it may, we cannot let
slip this opportunity to strike
at the Cleft of Chaos.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Suppose there's no tellin' when we might
get another shot at this. Let's roll out.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_010_CUT_000_010.text:
King Din! Sorry, but we ain't
quite claimed the ruins yet.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_020_CUT_000_010.text:
What're you doing all the way out here,
King Din!? The war'll be over if you go
and get yourself killed!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_020_CUT_000_020.text:
I would bear witness to the
final battle for myself.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Talk about rampin' up
the dang pressure...

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_040_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_040_CUT_000_010.text:
This legendary treasure
is sure helpin' out.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_040_CUT_000_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_040_CUT_000_020.text:
Do not let up! Strike at them
and seal the Cleft!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_000.text:
And with that, the Cleft is sealed.
For a time, at least, peace will
reign across the land.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_010.text: Shouldn't we close 'er up for good?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_020.text:
We have attempted many approaches—such
as blockading it with soil or water—but ever
does the maw of Chaos yawn wide. All we can do is enjoy a moment's peace
until the time comes when we must
summon warriors once more.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_030.text:
Meaning the fight'll just start again
one day. Whole thing's pointless.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_040.text:
We do not think so. The Cleft's appearance
leads to the arrival of warriors, and we
are able to meet their kind from across
the worlds only when it is opened.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_050.text:
Well, I reckon we DID meet a real colorful
cast of warriors, even if we didn't find
the triangle we need.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_060.text:
Ah, but I recently got my hands on a triangle
that found its way into Brighthome from the
Conjoined Worlds. Behold!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_070.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_070.text:
Heck, that's it! Thanks a heap, King Din.
Getting our hands on this means we'll
be able to look back on our experience
in Brighthome as a real fine thing.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_080.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_080.text:
It has been an unparalleled honor
to meet you both, Seer!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_090.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_090.text:
Say, do you think King Din really found
that triangle recently like he said?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_100.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_000_CUT_010_100.text:
We have it. Prying into the hows
and whys won't do us no good.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_020_CUT_010_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_020_CUT_010_010.text: Wait, you mean it ain't over?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_020_CUT_010_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_020_CUT_010_020.text:
The Cleft of Chaos will open again erelong,
at which point our battle will flare anew.
Warriors will then arrive in Brighthome once
more, for such is the way of things here.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_020_CUT_010_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_020_CUT_010_030.text: This place is an eternal battlefield.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_020_CUT_010_040.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_020_CUT_010_040.text:
Correct, Seer. Brighthome is a world locked
in eternal conflict—but this only makes our
fleeting moments of peace all the sweeter. Now then, the object you seek is here,
so I suggest you take it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_020_CUT_010_041.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_020_CUT_010_041.text:
I got no interest in gettin' caught up
in another war without end, thanks.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_020_CUT_010_050.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_020_CUT_010_050.text:
I thank you one and all,
my brave warrior bands!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_030_CUT_010_000.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_030_CUT_010_000.text:
And thus is the Cleft blocked off.
Your strength was formidable, Seer—
rather too formidable, in fact.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_030_CUT_010_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_030_CUT_010_010.text:
You make it sound like we did
something you aren't wild about.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_030_CUT_010_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_030_CUT_010_020.text:
I so enjoy watching our warriors do battle that
I often find myself wishing the war might go on
forever. Thus did I call you here to shore up
the fighting strength of our bands, but now...

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_030_CUT_010_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_030_CUT_010_030.text:
You must've been a warrior at some point, right?
So how can you look at all this and ENJOY it!?
Hell, you know EXACTLY what it means to be
the grunt in that position, don't you!?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_030_CUT_010_040.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_030_CUT_010_040.text:
The triangle you seek is here.
Take it and begone.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_030_CUT_010_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_030_CUT_010_050.text:
I'd bet you can't even comprehend
what it means to get this triangle!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_040_CUT_010_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_040_CUT_010_010.text:
We got legendary power on our side and
STILL can't close the Cleft up for good?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_040_CUT_010_020.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_040_CUT_010_020.text:
Correct. The Cleft of Chaos will open again erelong,
at which point our battle will flare anew. New warriors
will then arrive in Brighthome, making this but a single
page in our great history.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_040_CUT_010_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_040_CUT_010_030.text:
And what'll happen to
the legendary weapon?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_040_CUT_010_040.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_040_CUT_010_040.text:
A legend must ever remain a legend.
And left as-is, the triangle you seek
would likely become a legendary
undiscovered treasure of its own.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_040_CUT_010_050.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_040_CUT_010_050.text: Well, let's hope that don't happen.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_040_CUT_010_060.speaker: King_Din
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_HOLE_040_CUT_010_060.text:
Thus did I have Pirate search it out.
One legend is plenty.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Looks like we got a temple here. Bit surprisin'
there's no fiends, given that we're right in
the maw of the beast. Still, don't seem we
need to worry about protectin' this place.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_010.text: You do not! For I, Sorceress, am here!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
I was surprised to see more newcomers,
but then realized you two must be Seer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Ah, but what fine timing! The forces of Chaos
have come, drawn as they are to your power.
Now you can show me just what King Din's
secret weapons are made of!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_TEMPLE_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Perhaps you truly are the one who will bring
an end to the battle with Chaos. I pray this
might be so, for I have grown weary of war.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Why have you come to this Hell?
Is the triangle truly so important?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Sure is—but also we're a mite
worried about the situation here.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_020.text:
You are worried about ME? Ha ha ha!
How wonderfully insincere of you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_030.text: Did King Din summon you here, too?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_040.text:
I am Gadget. I came here with my own name,
but that's the one I use now that I am working
for the king.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_050.text:
That means we're on the same team, then.
You say the word if somethin' goes sour and you
need help, 'cause isolation on the battlefield is a
great way to get yourself dead.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_060.text:
As though 'help' could even exist in Hell.
If you cling to the thread of salvation,
sooner or later it will snap and send you
plummeting into the abyss.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_RUIN_000_CUT_000_070.text:
And with that, the enemies close in.
Let us see how you fare!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text:
If you've come for a grave, you can dig your own.
I don't have enough hands to be digging one for
everybody who keels over right now.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text:
I ain't plannin' on pushin' up daisies
just yet. So are them fiends some kinda
graverobbers, then?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text:
They sure as hell are! The dastards come
here, dig up corpses, and turn 'em into
servants of Chaos. And if they manage to take the graveyard,
we'll be up to our armpits in enemies
trying to send us into our own graves.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text:
So this graveyard's an important strategic
position? You must be a heckuva warrior
if you're charged with watchin' the place.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text:
Hell yeah I'm strong—ask any of the other
warriors around here, and they'll all tell ya
no one holds a candle to the Warden!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text: Well, keep up the good work, y'hear?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT_000_.text:
Don't leave! I've got more to say!
...Bah, they're gone.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_000_CUT_000_000.text:
The forces of Chaos can even build
a big ol' fortress like this?
That's a pretty human way to war.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_000_CUT_000_010.text:
They did not build this stronghold—
they stole it from us. This is why
it's proven so difficult to reclaim.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Gotcha. Well then, our first priority should
be takin' the place back, 'cause we'll have
victory in our sights if we do!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FORT_000_CUT_000_030.text:
That is correct. Also, I am Gunner,
the leader of the warrior band here.
Thank you for your aid, Seer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This is awful. I guess Chaos invaded
and made a mess of this here town.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_000_CUT_000_010.text:
It did—and soon, every place in this
world will suffer the same fate.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_000_CUT_000_030.text:
If the warrior bands were truly so powerful,
this war would not have dragged on so long.
Alas, the reality of the war with Chaos is
not so kind as all that.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_000_CUT_000_040.text:
I know people don't survive wars with pretty
ideas alone, but I still reckon we can do
somethin' about this one.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_000_CUT_000_050.text: Indeed, for you are both Seer.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_000_CUT_000_060.text:
You're talkin' like you can see the future,
there, pardner. What's your story?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CITY_000_CUT_000_070.text:
I am Floral, and the land tells me all.
The forces of Chaos will be upon us soon.
I pray you might fight them off, Seer!
Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, joy. King Din's little plaything
is back. Not looking all that reliable
this time, are you, plaything?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
King Din called you here same as us.
No need for the lip when there ain't
no difference between us.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
No difference!? NO DIFFERENCE!?
I'll SHOW you the difference, plaything!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_000_CUT_000_030.text: Guess there was a difference after all.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Thanks a ton for your help out here
in the fields. I mean, not that we're
growing anything, but still.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Then why now make your way
to the front lines and fight?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Cause I'm Manikin, a glorified scarecrow
who can't do anything BUT protect fields!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_030.text: So why'd King Din call you here?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_040.text:
No idea. Glorified scarecrow, remember?
But there WAS something I realized this
one time when I was staring motionlessly
at the fields...

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_050.text:
You score some intel, feller?
Let's hear it.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_060.text: There are no crows in Brighthome!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_FIELD_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Oh. Okay. Well, you keep up
the good work, y'hear?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, I'm so glad you're here, Seer!
I've been waiting for you to come
for SO LONG!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_020.text:
You gotta take me the hell out of here,
because I absolutely cannot STAND
being here one second longer! C'mon, you can do that, right? Please!
I'll do anything! I'm begging you!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Cool your jets. Er, literally, maybe?
Tell me what happened to set this
whole mess off.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_040.text:
I chew up fiends and spit 'em back out!
Then I do it again! And again! And AGAIN!
I can't take it anymore! I CAAAAAAN'T!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_050.text:
I hear that. But King Din called you here,
and I can't very well take you away without
so much as a by-your-leave. I'm real sorry.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_CHURCH_000_CUT_000_060.text: No! Don't go! Don't leave me here!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_00.text:
If the forces of Chaos are showing up this
close to the castle, this war might finally
be close to ending...in our defeat. Oh. Hello there. I'm President.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Hang in there, feller! Once you get the notion
of defeat in your head, you're already dead!
That's just how the battlefield works.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_02.text:
So you're Seer. Well, considering you only
just arrived, I see why you would trust
in King Din's power. But for the rest of us, it doesn't mean
a thing. That guy doesn't do a damn thing;
whatever we accomplish, we do on our own.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_03.text:
I know the warrior bands are doing their best,
but there's been no indication that the forces
of Chaos are weakening—so if you think I'm
losing heart, that's why.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Well, we're gonna do something about it,
so you just hang in there a little bit longer.
Believe in the power of Seer, pardner!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Well, you certainly seem confident,
so...I guess I'll trust you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_REBEL_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Immunity
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_REBEL_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Blargh! It's just as I feared! 
The rebels have appeared!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_REBEL_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Immunity
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_REBEL_000_CUT_000_020.text:
My name's Immunity, and it's my job to
keep the warriors King Din summoned from
betraying him and joining up with Chaos.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_REBEL_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Immunity
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_REBEL_000_CUT_000_040.text:
YES, ACTUALLY! THAT'S EXACTLY WHAT THEY DID!
I mean, King Din may have named me Immunity,
but I can't immunize people from wanting to
rebel! Heck, all I really do is carry oxygen...

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_REBEL_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_REBEL_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Then we better crush 'em before anyone else
gets it in their sweet little heads to rebel.
You just let us handle this one, feller!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_REBEL_010_CUT_000_050.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_REBEL_010_CUT_000_050.text:
Well then, reckon we'll have
to do somethin' about 'em.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Where in the hells be that legendary treasure,
by gar!? I searched this blasted castle from
stem to stern, and I ain't been findin' the
gods-damned thing anywhere!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_010.text: So King Din called you here, too.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Yar, lasses! Announce yerself before ye appear
and start yer yammerin'! Ye made me jump
outta me skin, so ye did! Gar, but I be Pirate. Who be ye?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Gahar har har! King Din's
little trump cards! Sorry to break it to ye, but there
already be a treasure hidden here in Brighthome
that can turn the tide of the war without ye—
and I was called here to be sniffin' it out!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Sure thing, pardner. You seen any
noteworthy triangles around while
you been busy with the sniffin'?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Be triangles some manner of treasure?
If it be, ye bet yer boots I'll find it!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_ITEM_000_CUT_000_070.text:
A treasure that can turn the tide of the war?
Be nice if something like that existed,
but I reckon it don't. Probably be best not to get our hopes up
for the triangle, neither.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
Gar, curse me bones!
It ain't here, neither!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text: Our triangle ain't here in town.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
Our triangle ain't buried
out here in the fields.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
Don't seem like our triangle's been
hauled in from the mine.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
Don't think our triangle's been
buried with anybody here.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
Sure don't seem like anybody brought
the triangle into this here church.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
Ain't seen hide nor hair
of our triangle here in town.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
Doesn't seem like the triangle's
been overlooked in this stronghold.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
If the triangle were here in the temple
it's be showin' its power somehow.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_NOTFINDITEM_000_CUT_00.text:
Sure would make a gal wonder what time period
our triangle were from if we were to find it here
in the dang ruins!

SUB_W17_FUNC_BOFO_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_FUNC_BOFO_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Gahar har har! I've found it!
The legendary treasure!

SUB_W17_FUNC_BOFO_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_FUNC_BOFO_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Well, ain't you just a peach!
So how about our triangle?

SUB_W17_FUNC_BOFO_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_FUNC_BOFO_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Ah, right! Ye be lookin' for a triangle.
I ain't found nothin' like that, lassies,
which means it likely ain't treasure at all.
Such a shame for ye! Gahar har har!

SUB_W17_FUNC_BOFO_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_FUNC_BOFO_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Ain't nothin' to be done about that—but
hey, you go right ahead and turn the tide'a
the war with that legendary weapon. As for us, I reckon our triangle's
in the hands of some Chaos feller.

SUB_W17_FUNC_BOFO_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Buccaneer
SUB_W17_FUNC_BOFO_FINDITEM_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Aye, I'll do just that—but
then the treasure be mine!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Chief
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
You pitched in to fight too, Guv?
Much appreciated.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Doll
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Heya, Guv! You helped with the
fighting? Thanks for that!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Bully
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Been a minute and a half, eh, Guv?
You and I gotta scrap next time!

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Lord
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
You were out there fighting, Guv?
My apologies—I did not realize.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Vacuum
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Ha ha ha! Been a long time, Guv!
Let's spar again sometime.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Fiore
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Why, if it isn't Guv!
I thank you for joining the fight.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Arsenal
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Your presence here explains
our victory, Guv. Thank you.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Sorceress
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
Well, well. If it isn't Guv.
Surprised you're still out there
fighting and not retired already.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Gadget
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_00.text:
You're looking pretty tired there, Guv.
Ready for your trip to Hell so soon?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_02.text:
The two of you are Seer, yes? Ah, no wonder
I felt that dazzling radiance; with warriors
like you here, I can finally retire in peace.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_02.text:
Oh, and you were searching for a
special triangle, yes? Did you have
any luck in finding it?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl from town. I pray your fight
goes well, m'ladies.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl who works in the fields.
I pray your fight goes well, m'ladies.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl who works in the mine.
I pray your fight goes well, m'ladies.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl who works in the cemetery.
I pray your fight goes well, m'ladies.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl from the church. I pray your
fight goes well, m'ladies.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl from town. I pray your fight
goes well, m'ladies.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl from the stronghold. I pray
your fight goes well, m'ladies.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl from the temple. I pray your
fight goes well, m'ladies.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm done with the warrior's life. Instead,
I'm going to live out the rest of my days
with a girl from the ruins. I pray your
fight goes well, m'ladies.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_010_CUT_000_04.text: World sure do got all kinds.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_020_CUT_000_00.text: Don't see Guv or his lady love around.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_020_CUT_000_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_VILLAGE_020_CUT_000_01.text:
Well, I'm sure they're livin' a real
blissful life out there somewhere.

SUB_W17_FUNC_BOFO_HELP_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_FUNC_BOFO_HELP_000_CUT_000_000.text: Ah! You must be the newcomers.

SUB_W17_FUNC_BOFO_HELP_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_FUNC_BOFO_HELP_000_CUT_000_010.text: Sure are. How'd you figure that?

SUB_W17_FUNC_BOFO_HELP_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_FUNC_BOFO_HELP_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Age isn't a factor for warriors in Brighthome.
Young and old, known and unknown—warriors of
all stripes are called to this place. But no matter their actual age, every newcomer
has a certain youthful vitality to them—
a vitality I sense now in you.

SUB_W17_FUNC_BOFO_HELP_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_FUNC_BOFO_HELP_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Alas, such vitality is something a wizened old man
like me has lost. I'm a warrior as well, you see—
though a worn and battered one. Guv is the name
given to me by the king, and all I'll answer to.

SUB_W17_FUNC_BOFO_HELP_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_FUNC_BOFO_HELP_000_CUT_000_040.text:
It's a good name, Guv. Glad we've got
a seasoned vet like you around here.

SUB_W17_FUNC_BOFO_HELP_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Guv
SUB_W17_FUNC_BOFO_HELP_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Ha! You've quite the silver tongue,
newcomer! Just make certain you
fight as well as you flatter.

SUB_W17_FUNC_BOFO_HELP_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_FUNC_BOFO_HELP_000_CUT_000_060.text:
You know it! By the by, we're out here lookin'
for a special triangle. Mind givin' us a holler
if you happen to stumble across it?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Simon
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_000.text:
With the battle ended, we no longer need
to use the names given to us by the king.
I am called Simon.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Howdy, pard! I'm Bonnie,
and this here's Formina.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Simon
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Did you obtain the triangle
you were looking for?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Sure did. So what'd you come
to Brighthome for anyhow?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Simon
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_040.text:
The members of my squadron all perished
in battle—and when I failed to fulfill my
objective, I joined them in death. The next thing I knew, I was waking
here in Brighthome with a new name.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Wait, you mean we might be dead, too?
Oh, go on! But hey, what say we mosey on
outta here and find out for sure, Formina?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Simon
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Is my following you two
out of the question?

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_070.text:
It's fine by us, but aren't you dead?
If so, you might just disappear if you
decide to leave Brighthome.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Simon
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_080.text:
I have no intention of fighting for all
eternity in Brighthome. If I disappear,
that is simply as it was meant to be.

SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W17_EVAR_BOFO_SIMON_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Takes a yard'a guts to say that, pardner.
But if you're ready, we'll leave together.
